long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hire Service Company bespoke employee care. This extension is to support safe guarding in the workplace. Certain key phrases are looked for and if there is a potential care issue, it provides the ability to pause for thought, offers some emergency care information and allows continuing of search. No information is recorded and reported on.
